critique: This document amends Schedules A and B of the Civil Service Rules, detailing positions excepted from competitive examination and those that may be filled upon noncompetitive examination. It covers a wide range of federal departments and agencies, specifying job titles and conditions under which appointments can bypass standard procedures. There's a focus on temporary or specialized roles, positions in remote locations, and those requiring specific skills or knowledge. The document aims to provide flexibility in staffing while maintaining some oversight through the Civil Service Commission.
